```lisp
[
(:action place
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (has ?actor ?item) (at ?actor ?location) (not (placed ?item ?location)))
  :effect (and (placed ?item ?location) (not (has ?actor ?item)))
)

(:action remove
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (placed ?item ?location) (not (removed ?item ?location)))
  :effect (and (removed ?item ?location) (not (placed ?item ?location)) (has ?actor ?item))
)

(:action press
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?entity - object ?surface - object)
  :precondition (and (has ?actor ?entity) (at ?actor ?surface) (not (pressed ?entity)))
  :effect (pressed ?entity)
)

(:action create
  :parameters (?creator - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (available ?creator) (at ?creator ?location) (not (created ?item)))
  :effect (created ?item)
)
]
```
